data.quote: You cannot be a powerful and life-changing presence to some people without being a joke or an embarrassment to others.
data.author: Mark Manson

data.quote: Challenge yourself to find the good and beautiful thing inside of everyone. It’s there. It’s your job to find it. Not their job to show you.
data.author: Mark Manson

data.quote: Rejection exists for a reason — it’s a means to keep people apart who are not good for each other.
data.author: Mark Manson

data.quote: The less you talk about your shame, the more of it you have.
data.author: Mark Manson

data.quote: Life shrinks and expands in proportion to one’s courage.
data.author: Mark Manson

data.quote: Humans are attracted to each other’s rough edges.
data.author: Mark Manson

data.quote: Man sacrifices his health in order to make money. Then he sacrifices his money to recuperate his health. And then he is so anxious about the future that he does not enjoy the present; the result being that he does not live in the present or the future; he lives as if he is never going to die, and then dies having never really lived.
data.author: Mark Manson
